mapper.insert: INSERT INTO league ( league_no, event_no, league_manager, league_title, league_detail, league_entry_fee, league_start, league_end, chat_room_no, location_no ) VALUES ( #{leagueNo}, #{eventNo}, #{leagueManager}, #{leagueTitle}, #{leagueDetail}, #{leagueEntryFee}, #{leagueStart}, #{leagueEnd}, #{chatRoomNo}, #{locationNo})
mapper.select: select * from league_list_view order by league_no desc
mapper.update:
UPDATE league
event_no = #{leagueDto.eventNo},
league_manager = #{leagueDto.leagueManager},
league_title = #{leagueDto.leagueTitle},
league_detail = #{leagueDto.leagueDetail},
league_entry_fee = #{leagueDto.leagueEntryFee},
league_start = #{leagueDto.leagueStart},
league_end = #{leagueDto.leagueEnd},
league_status = #{leagueDto.leagueStatus},
chat_room_no = #{leagueDto.chatRoomNo},
location_no = #{leagueDto.locationNo},
WHERE league_no = #{leagueNo}
